name: Fantasy General II
summary: Armies once again draw battle-lines on the war-torn land of Keldonia, and a new generation of commanders will test their bravery and tactics against each other. Fantasy wargaming is back!
info:

  • 游戏类型: TBS

  • 发行: Slitherine Ltd.
  • 开发: Owned by Gravity
